subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati center fielder Shin-Soo Choo, who is expected to be one of the top free agents on the market this winter, might make a great addition for the Mets.
snippet: Cincinnati center fielder Shin-Soo Choo, who is expected to be one of the top free agents on the market this winter, might make a great addition for the Mets.
